item.description:
There have been some requests to hold a Meetup on Sunday mornings.  This will be an informal Meetup (not that the others are all that formal) but there is no planned organizer for this.  If anyone wants to volunteer to organize just let me know prior to each Sunday and I can mark you as the organizer for that week.

 

I may end up combining this morning Meetup with the soon-to-be regularly scheduled Sunday afternoon Meetups but we'll see.  I'll keep you posted.

 

Happy Hitting

Adam Kenger

Organizer

Somerville Tennis Meetup Group
item.name: Informal Sunday morning tennis
